import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.f612da3e: Thus data corresponds to the period from 1980-2019.
source.598f09e5: The dataset contains data regarding percentage of children vaccinated pertaining to 214 countries over a period of 40 years for 14 vaccines grouped by type/dose information.
source.bee37ecc: It can be seen that these columns contains the same information. It can also be noted that the data is not available for all countries for all vaccines. Hence for any particular use case, the sufficieny of available data needs to be checked.
